Title: Authorizes the city of Mt. Vernon to establish a school speed zone demonstration program
Summary: Authorizes the city of Mt. Vernon to establish a school speed zone demonstration program; authorizes installation in no more than twenty school speed zones in such city.
LawCode: Add ยง1180-h, V & T L; amd ยง87, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the public officers law, in relation to authorizing the city of Mt. Vernon to establish a school speed zone demonstration program; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
